### getCommonScalarType() {#a1d1c2bc5710b2b6ca489fed0de8f8c54}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Type &#42; llvm::sandboxir::VecUtils::getCommonScalarType (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; Bndl)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Similar to <a href="#a033de8f81a298858c0219b067c983618">tryGetCommonScalarType()</a> but will assert that there is a common type.

So this is faster in release builds as it won&#39;t iterate through the values.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/vecutils-h/#l00172">172</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/vecutils-h">VecUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getLastPHIOrSelf() {#a44997afa363c2b4d0d083e8b8930f1af}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Instruction &#42; llvm::sandboxir::VecUtils::getLastPHIOrSelf (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
If <code>I</code> is not a PHI it returns it.

Else it walks down the instruction chain looking for the last PHI and returns it. \\Returns nullptr if <code>I</code> is nullptr.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/vecutils-h/#l00145">145</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/vecutils-h">VecUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getLowest() {#a089cccbe66baa77d85c8a291030c7796}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Instruction &#42; llvm::sandboxir::VecUtils::getLowest (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; Instrs)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
\\Returns the instruction in <code>Instrs</code> that is lowest in the BB.

Expects that all instructions are in the same BB.

### getLowest() {#a47d4037afa835a57270728d8d3ffb051}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Instruction &#42; llvm::sandboxir::VecUtils::getLowest (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; Vals, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
\\Returns the lowest instruction in <code>Vals</code>, or nullptr if no instructions are found.

Skips instructions not in <code>BB</code>.

### getNumElements() {#a1da59e4d92074c48b90598f4acbf1852}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static int llvm::sandboxir::VecUtils::getNumElements (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42; Ty)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
\\Returns the number of elements in <code>Ty</code>.

That is the number of lanes if a fixed vector or 1 if scalar. ScalableVectors have unknown size and therefore are unsupported.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/vecutils-h/#l00027">27</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/vecutils-h">VecUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getNumLanes() {#a479afbad1ecdf87d1104b5af42f0391f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static unsigned llvm::sandboxir::VecUtils::getNumLanes (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42; Ty)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
\\Returns the number of vector lanes of <code>Ty</code> or 1 if not a vector.

NOTE: It asserts that <code>Ty</code> is a fixed vector type.

\\Returns the expected vector lanes of <code>V</code> or 1 if not a vector.

### getWideType() {#a77936f3aa272a4d31b547919e87b85d6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Type &#42; llvm::sandboxir::VecUtils::getWideType (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42; ElemTy, unsigned NumElts)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
\\Returns &lt;NumElts x ElemTy&gt;.

It works for both scalar and vector <code>ElemTy</code>.

### tryGetCommonScalarType() {#a033de8f81a298858c0219b067c983618}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Type &#42; llvm::sandboxir::VecUtils::tryGetCommonScalarType (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; Bndl)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
If all values in <code>Bndl</code> are of the same scalar type then return it, otherwise return nullptr.
